document_data.name: Aldimer
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Aldimer''' family was a noble merchant family of the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]]. The head of the family sat on the [[High Council]] that governed Tantras.

In [[1358 DR]], shortly after the [[Time of Troubles]], the Aldimers were allied with the [[Mathlin]] and [[Uruthkurt]] families.
